post:
Hello,

I want show you service I'm using from some time in Poland. 

[webh.pl](http://webh.pl) is giving you:

1 CPU core ~3,0 GHz
1 GB RAM
10 GB SSD space (you can buy extra 10 GB SSD for ~1,5USD)
unlimited traffic
Location: **Poland / Warsaw / ATMAN**

[**CLICK HERE TO ORDER**](http://webh.pl/) (instructions how to do that is located below)
(you can also use [my referral link](http://skraca.cz/webhzamow) - thanks )

**19PLN monthly = ~6USD/month
171PLN yearly = ~47USD/month**

The datacenter which those servers are located in is the most known DC in Poland. 


To order something on this service (for those who are not able to read in Polish), you have to:

- click on [this link](http://webh.pl) (you can also use [my referral link](http://skraca.cz/webhzamow) - thanks )

- you have to go on "Serwery VPS" tab

- you have to press "Zamów serwer VPS" under the "OpenVZ Lite" tab

- you have enter your personal data

- you have to choose "Okres płatności" option which will meets your expectactions



Example IP for pings: 91.230.204.43



Service is running from few years and there was no problems with it in whole timeline I remember (I'm their "mother-company" client from 2 years and those are in the same DC).

I'm not connected with this company in any way, however if you will have some questions, fell free to ask, I will try to help.


**btw. You can also test those services for free for 7 days. When you will be registered and logged into panel you have to "buy" new VPS with choosing "7 dniowy okres testowy 0.00 PLN".**
